#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Self Reflect
#Text=In this extremely fast paced world , millions forget how to live for themselves and others .
#Text=When one does , they live wrongly for themselves and incidentally , and act selfishly towards others .
#Text=Self reflection is about taking time to think about your life and your purpose , as well as your place in the world .
#Text=It 's about questioning the choices you 've made , to check now and then that you 're still living true to your own values .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Understanding the Purpose of Self Reflection
#Text=Know why you are self-reflecting .
#Text=Ask yourself why are you self-reflecting .
#Text=Did you do something wrong or things are always going wrong for you ?
#Text=What is it ?
#Text=Know the subject on your self-reflection moments .
#Text=What is about ?
#Text=Is it about your life in general or you being hurt by someone .
#Text=Finding a Quiet Place
#Text=Spend this time alone somewhere where no one can possibly hear you .
#Text=Possibly , have a pen and paper to map out your thoughts .
#Text=Practicing Self Reflection
#Text=Talk to yourself .
#Text=No one is judging you .
#Text=It 's just that you are thinking aloud .
#Text=This is very important as you are engaging your senses .
#Text=Do a breathing exercise .
#Text=Inhale and exhale as many times as as you want .
#Text=For every breathing , say something out , i. e ,
#Text=I 've done well I need to do this. .
#Text=Thank yourself for even realizing that you need to self-reflect .
#Text=Pour out your emotions .
#Text=Cry if you need to .
#Text=The point is to reach the goal of solving a problem and understanding your self better .
#Text=Write them down .
#Text=Read .
#Text=We all need to read at one point of time to see and feel how much luckier you may be than the millions whose lives are in danger every single day , without a choice .
#Text=Read widely to find out how people live elsewhere and what they do to survive against the odds .
#Text=Some more suggestions are provided in Tips , below .
#Text=Focus on the past .
#Text=Try to remember a time in your past .
#Text=It could be a year ago , ten years , five minutes , however far back you 'd like to reflect .
#Text=Focus on events that happened around that time in your past .
#Text=How did you feel about them ?
#Text=How did you react and why ?
#Text=Learn to understand all perspectives of the situation .
#Text=Maybe you were irrational at first ; maybe you were completely right in your actions .
#Text=Let go of any negative feelings or grudges you still hold .
#Text=Wallowing in your misery or anger wo n't help you grow as a person .
#Text=Many people believe that everything happens for a reason .
#Text=If your past had been altered , you would n't be who you are today .
#Text=Everything in life is a lesson if you look at it the right way .
#Text=Return to the present .
#Text=With everything you 've learned from your past , you 'll hopefully have a wiser perspective of your present and future life .
#Text=Putting Self Reflection into Action
#Text=Count your blessings .
#Text=Are you having a first world problem ?
#Text=Do you know there 's also something known as a third world problem ?

#Text=Say these out based on your subject matters : I can do it I feel sorry now for that person maybe I can help I will take care of myself from now on Thank you thank you thank you thank you ! I need to change my ways to be a better person etc.
#Text=Plan to pay it forward .
#Text=Donate , help others out and ask yourself , why are you donating .
#Text=Video
#Text=Tips
#Text=When you read a fiction book , always seek to find what the story is about and ask yourself what can you learn from it , no matter what it is about .
#Text=This will keep you in check time and time again .
#Text=Read a non-fiction book .
#Text=Memoirs , bio , non-fiction are categorized for a reason .
#Text=Mostly , you can learn from .
#Text=For example , read I 'm Prohibited by Hanz Moniefiero Medina .
#Text=A short novel but you can learn many things from this particular ebook .
#Text=It 'll take you one crazy ride .
#Text=Search it on Amazon or Kobo and Smashwords .
#Text=Read books that pull your heartstrings and or you can relate to from reading the description of the book or synopsis .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=The idea of self-reflection is to never get depressed or brood about and hold grudges .
#Text=You are supposed to be either be thankful of how lucky you are , finding a solution on how to reach out to help yourself or anything .
#Text=Smile at the end of it all and read what you have mapped out and plan your next move to being a better person .
#Text=We are all supposed to live , learn , give , receive , thank , have fun .
#Text=Problems are created by your thoughts and many times it 's easy to solve it .
#Text=Quick Summary
